name: Order Delivery Date And Time
author: ThemeHigh

sections.description:
Don’t keep your shoppers worried about their order delivery. A systematic order delivery planning can bring you regular customers and enhance their shopping experience by offering home delivery and self-pickup.

How it works

The Order Delivery | Pickup Date And Time Planner For Woocommerce plugin allows your customers to pick their preferred delivery/pickup date and time from the checkout page. The admin has the privilege to choose any unavailable days for delivery/pickup service, and to add specific days to set separate slots for those days. Depending on the needs of the store owner, bulk or individual slots can be specified.

Date Planner for Easy Delivery

  • Enable the delivery date picker option to activate the delivery date on your store’s checkout page.
  • Pre-set the processing time for prepping the delivery at your store’s convenient time.
  • You can set valid days for delivery and limit the number of dates to be picked by the user.
  • Select any start day of a week.
  • Pick a suitable date format.
  • ‘Auto Select First Available date’ option lets you automatically select the very next available date on the calendar for delivery.
  • Choose Off Days which you won’t be available for delivery.

Delivery Time Setter

  • Enable the delivery time picker option to activate the delivery time on your store’s checkout page.
  • Add a new time slot convenient for your store to deliver customers’ orders.
  • Enable the Delivery Time option and select your preferred time slot type.
  • Select the time slot type of your choice from the drop-down
    • Individual Time Slot
    • Bulk Time Slot
  • Pick Time Slot as per date or week base:
    • Week Days
    • Specific Dates
  • Based on the Time Slot Type selected, set the From & To time range.
    (If the time slot type is Bulk Time Slot, then enter slot duration and intervals between each slot.)

Pickup Date Settings

Pickup Date settings are similar to Delivery Date settings.

  • Activate the pickup date on your store’s checkout page, by enabling the pickup date selection.
  • Pre-set the processing time for pickup at your store’s convenient time.
  • You can set valid days for delivery and limit the dates to be picked by the user.
  • Select any start day of a week.
  • Pick a suitable date format to display .
  • Auto selects the very next available date.
  • Choose Off Days which you won’t be available for pickup.

Pickup Time Settings

  • Enable the pickup time picker option to activate the delivery time on your store’s checkout page.
  • Add a new time slot convenient for your store for customers to pick up orders.
  • Enable the Delivery Time option and select your preferred time slot type.
  • Select the time slot of your choice from the drop-down
    • Individual Time Slot
    • Bulk Time Slot
  • Pick Time Slot as per date or week base:
    • Week Days
    • Specific Dates
  • Based on the Time Slot Type selected, set the From & To time range.
    (If the time slot type is Bulk Time Slot, then enter slot duration and intervals between each slot.)

Special Occasion Slot

  • Create slots for special occasions by adding specific dates. So while creating a time slot you can pick those specific dates and schedule separate slots.

Holidays

  • Pre-set holidays for your store, so that customers won’t pick those specific dates for order delivery.

Other Settings

  • Set a position for the delivery/pickup field on the checkout page.
  • Provide a suitable name for the delivery/pickup field on the checkout page.

Explore Themehighs’ other plugins, and get to know about our team and how we help develop great e-commerce sites.

Join Themehigh Community to get help from similar people
sections.changelog:
1.0.6

  • Added delivery date and time block for checkout block.
  • Added a new filter (thwdtp_current_datetime) for changing the current datetime.
  • Added WooCommerce 8.5 compatibility.
  • Added WordPress 6.4 compatibility.

1.0.5

  • Added WooCommerce 8.0 compatibility.
  • Added WordPress 6.3 compatibility.

1.0.4

  • Added WooCommerce 7.7 compatibility.
  • Added WordPress 6.2 compatibility.
  • Added compatibility with HPOS table.

1.0.3

  • Fixed the issue with order delivery fields which are not showing on my account page.
  • Fixed the issue of displaying the required message, when the field is not visible.
  • Added WooCommerce 7.2 compatibility.
  • Added WordPress 6.1 compatibility.

1.0.2

  • Minor bug fixes.
  • Added WooCommerce 6.8 compatibility.
  • Added WordPress 6.0 compatibility.
  • Added 24hr time format.

1.0.1

  • Added WooCommerce 6.4.1 compatibility.
  • Added an option to display fields based on the shipping method.

1.0.0

  • Initial Release.

sections.reviews:
Nice but..

By zoraak on October 24, 2023

The plugin works efficiently and is transparent, but:

  • I miss editing the delivery date after the order has already been placed
  • placing the delivery date in the admin order menu in the shipping table would be a better solution than under the order status
  • I miss filtering orders based on customer selection, e.g. Today, tommorow or custom rage

I'm waiting for the update :)

Good plugin

By Amy911 (Aminata88) on September 9, 2023

Easy to set up and effective. Customer support answers quickly.

Great support

By mountainbirb on June 28, 2023

There was something incompatible with their plugin and they helped write custom snipped to fix it. They deserve love and respect!

These guys rock (Y)

By antskorsar on May 25, 2023

I had a problem, that payment provider plugin messed up the Order Delivery Date And Time plugin results not being in the customer emails and also in admin emails.
Those guys came and helped me with the solution.

5 stars for sure

5/5

By mbegs on May 5, 2023

Great support!

very nice, but buggy

By RwkY (rwky) on February 20, 2023

The plugin is not bad, it's good, but it has a few bugs like:

  • lack of translations, you can't translate the select date/hour inputs (example)
  • the admin emails do not show the date & time, only the client email shows
  • the client email, for some unknown reason, sometimes it does not show the date & time
  • the interface is built on 12pm/12am interface, I do appreciate that there is a 24h format (but only for front-end).

If you need to have the informations and translations done, you need to edit the plugin itself, as the support will just ask you to do remote diagnostics and I am not a fan of that.

Great plugin

By ndgmedia on January 27, 2023

Plug-in does what is needs to do and support is extremely helpful

Best delivery date plugin

By jesuszero on January 11, 2023

I used for multisite store and it works very good. I recomended it.

The support was very fast. It was amazing

Thanks!!!

Nice, but would like 24hour settings

By NETT.PRO (nettpro) on July 29, 2022

Nice plugin. Works best if you set field position before terms and condition (after delivery options) and enable fields based on shipping method. I would like to see option to set for 24hour clock instead of 12 AM/PM. Then I could use it in my country to.

Best wooCommerce order delivery date plugin

By sal07 on April 30, 2022

One of the best WooCommerce order delivery date plugin.The interface is very clean.l especially like the pickup date and time settings. So I can control order delivery date and pickup date from same plugin. The plugin is perfectly compatible with WooCommerce shipping methods
